full_output.summary: A fourth-year B.Tech student in Computer Science and Engineering at SRM University, AP, specializing in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML). I have a strong passion for programming and developing innovative solutions using various languages and technologies.

projects.name: Panoptic Segmentation for Medical Diagnosis
projects.description: The project named Panoptic Segmentation for Medical Diagnosis, aims to enhance segmentation accuracy through an innovative approach to nuclei segmentation in medical image analysis, utilizing panoptic segmentation techniques. I worked with datasets such as MoNuSeg, MoNuSAC, and the 2018 Data Science Bowl for nuclei segmentation.

projects.name: Full stack project
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive full-stack application using React for the frontend, Node.js for the back-end, and MySQL for the database. The application enables users to filter laptops based on various specifications such as brand, operating system, and RAM. Additionally, users are categorized into three groups - Beginner, Intermediate, and Pro - each with tailored specification filters.

projects.name: Event Management System
projects.description: Created a Java GUI-based project that demonstrates basic event management principles through a user input program. Users authenticate themselves with details stored in a MySQL database. After the authentication, users can enter event types and details, with the system ensuring that only one event can be booked for a particular date, thereby enhancing the efficiency of event scheduling. These event details are then stored in the database.

experiences.description: Developed and implemented web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP during a two-month internship with CodeSwap Solutions, contributing to successful project completion and gaining valuable web development skills.

full_output.name: Pavan Kumar Gulimi
